pages.title: Devilish Bargain
pages.text: Devilish Bargain Provides Discounted Villager Trades At The Price Of Half Of Your Health For The Duration Of The Effect.

pages.title: Applying Devilish Bargain
pages.text: You Can Apply Devilish Bargain By Right-Clicking A Totem Of Salvation With An Hostile Soul Shard In Your Offhand.
